taskRoles.name: hdfs_upload
taskRoles.command: hdfs_addr=$(sed -e "s@hdfs://@@g" <<< $PAI_DEFAULT_FS_URI) && mnt_point=/workspace/hdfs && mkdir -p $mnt_point && {hdfs-mount $hdfs_addr $mnt_point &} && while :; do cp -r /workspace/hdfs/zimiao/test_file ~/; sleep 10; mv ~/test_file /workspace/hdfs/zimiao/test_file_upload; sleep 10; rm -r /workspace/hdfs/zimiao/test_file_upload; sleep 10; done
